name: pnp-spfx-reference-scenarios-ace-pnp-contoso-orders
title: Contoso Orders ACE
shortDescription: This example shows an end to end solution with a couple of ACEs which interact with a back-end multi-tenant API.
longDescription: This example shows an end to end solution with a couple of ACEs which interact with a back-end multi-tenant API. The ACEs are ListOrders, to see a read-only list of orders, and ManageOrders, to list/add/update/delete orders. The solution relies on a back-end multi-tenant API, implemented as an Azure Function App. The source code of the Function App is available in the solution folder, too.
